text:
Hi all, does anyone know how on the Subscription Preferences system page to show the contact that is currently on that page and through api update independently of the subscription form properties in that contact? I can’t extract the id of such contact. Currently on the system pages email looks like this mail***@mail, for example.
Is there any way to recognize the user on such a page?

<@U3T21PDBK> this is my current favorite thing in the SDK right now

<https://share.zight.com/yAuBE9RA>

This is on updating a contact — like how is someone coming in here and saying — yup this is going to update the contact
then you can use this new sdk that is out
